EmailTemplate.subject: DXC and Turbonomic: Automation is the Answer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
The mission at DXC is clear: lead a global base of clients through their digital transformation journeys, built on a foundation of trust. To achieve this mission, Turbonomic Workload Automation is the answer.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/featured-content/turbonomic-amp-dxc-automation-is-the-answer]]>
Turbonomic automates decisions around placement, motion, sizing, and configuration in DXC's complex environment and delivering greater innovation to their clients while saving DXC over $1.25 Million in the first month.
Watch this video <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/featured-content/turbonomic-amp-dxc-automation-is-the-answer]]> to hear directly from Jim Haring, Greg Betz and Casey Crawford of DXC discuss how they deliver cloud economics to their client over-half million workloads with Turbonomic.
Regards, Team Turbonomic
